Figure 4. Testing methane consumption of 120 cm3 at two different methane inlet concentrations with a variety of flow rates. (A)
Methane was provided to the system at a concentration of 3% mixed with air. (B) Methane was provided to the system at a
concentration of 5.5% mixed with air.

caption:
Figure 5. Consumption rates of 5 tandem mini-units over time. Consumption rates were taken every several days using blue sense
sensors. The percent methane consumption was calculated by taking the inflow and outflow measurements, then subtracting the
two.

caption:
Figure 7. Methane consumption was tested using the larger 1840 cm3 at 3 different methane inlet concentrations 0.1%, 1%, 3%.
(A) Diagram of system setup. (B) Methane consumption at 0.1% inlet concentrations. (C) Methane consumption at 1% inlet
concentrations. (D) Methane consumption at 3% inlet concentrations.
